title: Dream Lover
description: Dusty is a teenage girl, as normal as any of her friends... The Dryads, Faeries, Nymphs, Angels, Cherubs and half-demons like her.She has a dark past, her mother was killed by a Demon and now she is protecting herself in case that Demon comes back for her.In the meantime Dusty travels from this world to the Astral Plane and her adventures are legendary... amongst her friends at least.
author: D. Michelle Gent
